summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 CHRYSLER 300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE CAP ON THE FUEL PUMP WAS LEAKING THROUGH THE ELECTRIC OUTLETS. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER TO BE REPAIRED WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL PUMP AND COVER NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 180,000. ...UPDATED 12/03/15 BF.   UPDATED 12/10/15*LJ     THE CONSUMER STATED THE MANUFACTURER WAS BEING UNCOOPERATIVE. UPDATED 10/17/2017*JS    UPDATED 05/18/18* JB
